title: India's auto retail sales register 0.73% annual growth in June on the back of prolonged heatwave
description: India's auto retail sales saw a 0.73 per cent annual growth in June, largely due to delayed monsoons in certain regions. The two-wheeler and three-wheeler segments saw positive YoY growth of 4.66 per cent and 5.1%, respectively. However, passenger vehicles, tractors, and commercial vehicles sales declined 6.7%, 28.3%, and 4.7%, respectively.
